mapper.select: /* 팝업 리스트 조회 */ SELECT POPUP_PAGE.ROWNUMBER , POPUP_PAGE.POPUP_SN , POPUP_PAGE.MNGR_TTL , POPUP_PAGE.BGNG_YMD , POPUP_PAGE.BGNG_HR , POPUP_PAGE.END_YMD , POPUP_PAGE.END_HR , POPUP_PAGE.POPUP_LEFT_PSTN , POPUP_PAGE.POPUP_TOP_PSTN , POPUP_PAGE.POPUP_CN FROM ( /* 순번 매기기 */ SELECT ROWNUM ROWNUMBER , POPUP.* FROM ( SELECT POPUP_SN , MNGR_TTL , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BGNG_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS BGNG_YMD , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BGNG_HR, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') AS BGNG_HR , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS END_YMD , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_HR, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') AS END_HR , POPUP_LEFT_PSTN , POPUP_TOP_PSTN , POPUP_CN FROM KB_POPUP_INFO ORDER BY POPUP_SN ASC ) POPUP ORDER BY ROWNUMBER DESC ) POPUP_PAGE WHERE ROWNUMBER BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

/* 팝업 상세 조회 */ SELECT POPUP_SN , MNGR_TTL , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BGNG_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS BGNG_YMD , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BGNG_HR, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') AS BGNG_HR , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS END_YMD , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_HR, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') AS END_HR , POPUP_LEFT_PSTN , POPUP_TOP_PSTN , POPUP_CN FROM KB_POPUP_INFO WHERE POPUP_SN = #{popupId}
